website_summaries.verdict: An extra-large lint roller that covers a large area in one pass and is great at picking up pet hair.
pros: Roller is 6.3 inches wide, making it ideal for larger surfaces
Includes a protective cover so sheets don't pick up dust and dirt when not in use
Sheets are very sticky and pick up pet hair easily
cons: The short handle is a little awkward to use with such a wide roller

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you let your pup sleep in the bed. It works very well, much easier than vacuuming, and helps save water because we don't have to wash as often. We have a golden that sheds quite a bit once or twice per year. This large roller is perfect. It is also good to remove the fur BEFORE washing to prevent putting a bunch of loose fur in the washer/dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Removes cat hair quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I have cats that specialize in sharing their fur!. This roller is nice and wide, so cleanup is quick. They don't have many sheets on the initial roll, so buy extras.
customer_reviews.author: Kiko

customer_reviews.title: Best lint roller made
customer_reviews.text: With two dogs (one of them a long-haired fur factory working triple shifts) we use a lot of lint rollers. This brand is the best out there and I've tried many. The paper is very sticky, convenient cover built into handle and the used paper is very easy to peel off.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Reader reviews

customer_reviews.title: Replacing the roller is next to impossible
customer_reviews.text: Love the roller up until you have to replace the lint roller - it's extremely difficult and doesn't work once you've replaced it. Not a bad product though
customer_reviews.author: Charles Butler

customer_reviews.title: Must have for fluffy pet owners.
customer_reviews.text: Have two long haired cats and a dog. The cat hair is insidious- it weaves its way into fabric. The wash just balls the cat hair into clumps that stick like Velcro to everything. This roller has been a game changer. It’s easy to use on fabric that is laying flat (vs on your body) and makes quick work of defuring.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Cat owner's savior
customer_reviews.text: This roller has a very solid build. Extremely comfortable to hand hold. The roll has its own weight so I don't even need to press hard to remove the cat hair all over my bed and clothes. Love the dust cap design. And the best part is, the sheets are no longer a piece of rectangle any more!!! It makes them 100x easier to peel off without worrying about ripping off 3 more layers underneath. Overall, good job!
customer_reviews.author: obunnyjump

customer_reviews.title: So happy to get this lint rollers because it works better ...
customer_reviews.text: Its very STICKY I have two cats at my home so these are a must for me. Its very sticky for removing cat hair from my work clothes and also the reason I purchased that I use it on for my car and all over the house. Its suitable for big area because of SUPERSIZE. There was an extra refill with it. So happy to get this lint rollers because it works better than any other lint roller that I’ve used. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lekyo

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: all i can say is that this is the best LINT ROLLER, i have eve bought in my entire life.... My situation at home i have 4 cats, who just love to sleep in my bed whenever i am not home. I just berly used this yesterday and omg thats all i can say. took all of the hairs off, in a second, the reason why i bought this bigger lint roller is because the regular ones are a waist of time since they are small. This has made my life way better..... although its a bit expensive compare to the other ones but it is really worth it... thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nivia Ordaz

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and how easily you can tear the paper off to the next one, I just wish it were a little more sticky. I added a photo of my couch for refrence.. it takes 10 sheets to clean my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Savanah

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this has a cover. You don’t have to try and put the protective non-sticky paper cover back on. To get a new, clean sticky surface you need to pull off at one corner and it’s not straight, it’s a spiral and comes off easily. You don’t have to tear the used sheet off. I used to use the big Scotch Brite one, I like this one better. 15MAR20: 2nd review: I love this thing so much, I bought it a second time for another house. My dogs don’t discriminate: they shed everywhere! I highly recommended this lint roller.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kooman

customer_reviews.title: Large size and great for pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: I found it to be very useful for pet hair! Especially for large areas like the bed, couch, rugs, and sweatshirts etc.. I have to use a lint roller every day because of my dog, and this one is a lot more convenient than the others I’ve tried due to it’s larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Huseyin E.

customer_reviews.title: Got pet hair?  Get this!
customer_reviews.text: A sticky roller that actually exceeded my expectations. It picks up pet hair AND.... lint, heavy dust, grains of sand, little pieces of foxgrass or weeds, cookie crumbs, and other mysterious debris. So far, it has also worked on hard, soft, and uneven surfaces. The centered handle is easy to control, the sticky sheets are easy to peel off, and I really like the attached cover for when it's not in use. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JustaShopper

customer_reviews.title: Useful in many ways
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product not for cleaning lint off of clothes but to try to clean stuff off the carpet in our van. I tried it this morning and how it did work. The carpet looks as clean as the day I bought the vehicle. If it did that, I know it will clean lint off of clothes. The great feature is that as the roller fills with lint, you just peal off a portion and have a clean, sticky piece. I would definitely buy this again if I need another one. The construction is good, so it may be awhile before I need another.
customer_reviews.author: C. Frick

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I never knew I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those gadgets you never knew you needed in your life! Lol Definitrly transformed my life living with a cat that enjoys sitting on my furniture lol. Great product, great use for what it's intended for & probably can make use to remove lint or other particles from clothing. (Check box if this is helpful review)
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Just feel better
customer_reviews.text: I love this roller and am going to buy more, not only for your cloths but for you furniture. We have two dogs and a cat, just use this once a day and never be embarrassed about his hair on the cough or you for Pete's sake. Works great ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to work better. This is large, which is great, but not that sticky. Doesn’t exactly pick up as much pet hair as I’d like. It can also only be used in one direction on clothing, otherwise the fabric will get pulled into the handle contraption (not that big of a deal, it just slows down the job).
customer_reviews.author: cortney lynn

customer_reviews.title: So satisfying!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lint roller like I've seen in Asian YouTube videos. They are big, have a storage holder, and roll front to back rather than side to side. This bad boy came up in my search here at Amazon and hits the bill. The adhesion is AWESOME. I have a black cat who sleeps at the head of my bed and when the seasons change I have a fur mess to sleep in. NOT ANY MORE. Generally one round with this roller and the head of my bed is cleared off.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet beds!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to clean our dog beds before we wash them. Easy to peel off the next tape when one is used!
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this product
customer_reviews.text: The roll unravels in small "Shreds". Totally useless. Its as if the roll has been "on the shelf" for years and is old. I could not use any of it. This product is now in my trash can.
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: A must for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: The product works wonderfully at removing pet hair. It is big and wide. the sheets peel off far easier than cheaper lint rollers. the handle is much easier to use than the wand lint rollers. It also has a very nice cover that completely covers the lint roller. It came with one refill and other available refills are reasonably priced. Highly recommend this product! Especially as an owner of two cats.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I know about this 20 years ago?
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so thrilled with something so inexpensive! Why didn’t I discover this 20 years ago when I started quilting? Here is a pic of my quilt design wall, and the threads that were picked up in just a few swipes of the supersize extra sticky roller. I had been using a dollar store roller, and go through them quickly, and they aren’t as sticky. This one is genius, and also better ergonomically. I almost never write reviews, but I had to! I will be sharing this with my quilt guild.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie HoHo

customer_reviews.title: Cat hair everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I used it the other day for the first time and I’m sure I will be buying it again. I was looking for a supersize lint roller for large areas and finally found what I was looking for. It is an easy way to get rid of all the cat hair on my clothes and the couch. It’s definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: clio

customer_reviews.title: 4 cats and finally this roller works!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually very surprised by how well this roller works! We have 4 cats and 2 of them are long haired. Everything seems to always be covered in cat hair. I use this on my comforter between washes and the couch. It’s super sticky and I love that it’s built into its cover. It was more than I wanted to spend but needed something. Very happy I did now.
customer_reviews.author: grlsyko

customer_reviews.title: Great Picker Upper!
customer_reviews.text: This roller is great and I love the way the next sheet peels off and at rest its covered with the slider. Very cool design The best part is it easily removes the old sticky paper for the new one
customer_reviews.author: Karen J McMenemy

customer_reviews.title: Great for shedding dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I have a white-haired dog and a dark grey couch, plus my son has a black comforter. This lint roller works great for getting the dog's hair off of all the surfaces she lays on. The layers are easy to peal off, too. Funny side note, my dog loves when I use it on her and it actually takes hair off of her! LOL Great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melbut123

customer_reviews.title: Better than I wished for!
customer_reviews.text: I've had many lint rollers, most are the basic size. I wanted larger sheets because I need to clean off lint and cat fur on my couch. What I like best with this one is the handle is in the position of a paint roller. It also closes over the roll to keep the next sheet clean. The sheets are easy to remove so I can continue quickly with my cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great on pet hair/furniture
customer_reviews.text: We got this as the vacuum doesn't get all our cat hair from our furniture - this works great to get it all off, and is a nice oversize to make it more efficient. The ability to close it is great as well so it doesn't stick to wherever it's stored.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aho

customer_reviews.title: Best lint roller ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This lint roller is life saving!!! I have a Siberian Husky and she is currently blowing her coat, so... DOG HAIR EVERYWHERE, but with this lint roller I can easily and quickly get the hair off my couches and clothes. With one roll the hair is picked up, unlike other rollers where you have to roll multiple times over one section. Not to mention the size of this lint roller saves me so much time! Another plus is that once a sheet is used up, it is so easy to peel away!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It works & love the attached cover!
customer_reviews.text: Best roller yet and I have been buying everything and anything you can think off for many years to remove pet hair and what not. I give it a 10. Not only does it work it’s magic, easy to remove, and even better the cover!!! I just hope that it doesn’t get discontinue or they change the ingredients on the sticky part as they do with so many things that work and for what ever reason they change!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Must Try!
customer_reviews.text: I love this freaking roller. It is so strong and durable. The only downfall is it could be a little wider. However I mistakenly rolled it across my stomach and it caught my skin something serious. It really has a good grip for my puppies shedding hair. Frenchies she’s a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog hair removal
customer_reviews.text: This works really well to remove dog hair from pouches , pillows ,blankets , etc . Really glad I got it . It’s a slightly stronger stickiness than a normal lint roller
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Cricut Girl
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product to use with my Cricut mats. It’s great large enough so I can use one roll to get all the traces of paper and fabric at one time. If you own a Cricut this is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: T. H. Flint

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. I use this for my bathroom rugs and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I use this for my bathroom rugs and it is a quick pass over. By far the best lint roller I have ever purchased and big enough to where I don't have to keep going over the same spot.
customer_reviews.author: cathy holler

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleanup fast and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Works great at cleaning up dust, lint and particles from my microsuede couches. The size and “stickiness” of the Adhesive roller makes cleaning efficient. Nothing worse than lint rollers that don’t pick up. Roller assembly seems durable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LisaLashes

customer_reviews.title: Great roller
customer_reviews.text: Great roller, replacement rollers are a little expensive but works awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Easy furniture lint rolling
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to use for furniture than a normal lint roller. I’d say it’s the same amount of sticky, but the shape and the width really help get the job done. Also. I really like the cover. It opens and shuts easily. I haven’t tried to replace the roll Yet but the sheets come off very nicely. Will definitely continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I have 2 cats and I love everything about it. The stickiness, the ease of removing each later, it's comfortable to handle, and of course being able to protect the roller when not in use. Will definitely recommend it but a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Glad I ordered refill packs. They are not super sticky....or sticky at all. It took 38 sheets to roll off average pup hair off a small loveseat, just the top two seats too. To the touch, not sticky either. Waste of money on this. Like the roller itself, but sheets simply don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay intact
customer_reviews.text: The roll won’t stay in the handle/cover and the sticky tape is like a normal lint roller brush. I’m returning the second one I bought and I don’t recommend buying one unless you want to get frustrated with trying to get dog hair off your sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Claire M

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Huge size
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Huge size. I am a pretty big guy and smaller sizes tend to be difficult to work with. Also cleaning up after the dog around the house with a wider surface area is much faster. Also more sheets in this model than scotch brite and other models.
customer_reviews.author: BMB Technology

customer_reviews.title: Works great on stubborn dog hair!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on getting stubborn husky hair off couch. Can easily clean off the chaise section with one sheet. Good quality. Just wish the rolls were bigger but overall it works great and lasts longer than the smaller rolls.
customer_reviews.author: T. Price

customer_reviews.title: Basically exactly what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as it could. Kind of a ridiculous and wasteful solution but not really any alternatives that are as effective.
customer_reviews.author: BNCap

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND! Best lint roller for animal hair removal!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried LOTS of tape lint removers to remove animal hair from furniture and clothing (before washing), and Metkix Lint Roller is the BEST BY FAR! Not only is it extremely sticky, significantly larger, and easier to use than the traditional ones, but the price is lower as well. Now I just hope I can find the refills-I noticed some customers were having trouble ordering as they were not in stock. Regardless, I am so glad I decided to order this!!! It has already saved me so much time and eased my frustration-HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: LizzieDM

customer_reviews.title: Tape eats up too fast
customer_reviews.text: Good for pet hair, though wide, the tape runs out very quick. Because the tape change is on an angle, it actually becomes time consuming to stop and change the tape several times every few minutes. It would be more ideal on one straight line with an easy tear off. Good adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R.

customer_reviews.title: These are fine...I really like the broom handle position...
customer_reviews.text: ...which makes it easier to use rather than the roller on the stick type. The only complaint I might have would have been more sheet capacity (or rollers) for the price. But eh, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pet lovers that shed
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I have 2 cats and I am constantly using a lint roller for fur. This is a great tool and I love that you can close it when not in use. Great price and comes with a refill. I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality--arrived with cracked handle.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it wasn't until I unwrapped it today that I discovered the handle is cracked. I'm not sure whether I will return it or try to duct-tape the handle. It's a shame, really, because I like the cover feature and size.
customer_reviews.author: Phaedra D. Blocker

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great for getting up the cat hair on my bed and couch, the adhesive worked great and it got all of the hair up quickly. It’s large size made it even better to use and it definitely works better than any small lint roller I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: BeetsBySchrute

customer_reviews.title: This does exactly what it says!  Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: My Great Dane’s bed ! Just a couple swipes and hair Gone!! Thank you so much. Somebody should have thought of this sooner!!! Works great—gets every hair on first pass.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C. Losson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works great to clean pet hair off my furniture, can’t wait till they have the refills
customer_reviews.author: Stacey N.

customer_reviews.title: Roll Away Pet Hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product. I usually get the Scotch Brite roller, but I'm finding this roller is better. It's less money and easier to remove the paper after use. I also like the cover for when I'm not using the roller. I have one very fluffy cat and I'm constantly removing hair from furniture. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This roller is exactly what I was looking for, I ordered it to remove dust from my linen headboard & it really made easier with its size, absolutely wonderful seller with great communication, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Beth Huntsberry

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Cat hair everywhere all the time. The fact that this is so large and that it is super easy to pull off a new strip have made this my new fave. I like the cover too so things dont get stuck to it while its just sitting around and waste sticky sheets
customer_reviews.author: esther

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: These things are AWESOME! You effect size for couches. I have two white couches, and can clean them in about 2 minutes. With two white couches and two German shepherds you can imagine how easily they get littered with pet hair and lint. I can’t imagine having these couches without this roller now!
customer_reviews.author: SethR

customer_reviews.title: 10 star product for anyone with a pet!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to get my dog’s hair out of my backseat. Thought I would give this a try. It is awesome!!! Works better than my vacuum! Also perfect for cat trees, bedspreads, and clothing! LOVE IT!!!!L
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Bearden

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have a Labrador/Border Collie rescue that sheds like crazy. She naps on a sheet on our bed and this is the only product that works on removing the hair. It is the only product I will buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathye Epley

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sticky and works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs shed so much! We have a lab/mix and even though we brush her she still manages to shed profusely. This picks up all of her hair and any other piece of dirt and grime it comes in contact with. The jumbo size allows me to get a large area in a shorter amount of time. We all keep one of the small ones in our vehicles because her hair literally follows us everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to clean off the felt from out pool table. We have animals so this is a very easy way to get rid of the hair rather then trying to brush it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Snell

customer_reviews.title: great for dog hair
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog who sheds long white hairs. They are on my clothes and furniture in abundance. I found that the Supersize helps faster. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jane Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like how the paper is really easy to pull off. Everything about this is great. I use it on my duvet cover every morning I make the bed.
customer_reviews.author: TravisM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s so nice to have a large roller! It’s very easy to use and store. It’s perfect size for the bed, blankets, and furniture. The reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is because of the adhesion. I think it should be a tad stickier for pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K.

customer_reviews.title: Super sticky tape!
customer_reviews.text: Love this device for picking dog hair up that is all over our bed & sofa because our dogs sleep on them. Easy to use, super sticky and easy to remove the tape. The only slight difficulty is removing the roll to refill it. I always have to watch the video on how to replace the refill and appreciate they have it included on the website.
customer_reviews.author: MK1644

customer_reviews.title: Works great worth money.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product it works good. I Have a cat and it removes the hair off my furniture and clothes I will be buying more in the future. It's not cheap made like the other ones I have brought that broke when I tried to remove the cat hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mzann

customer_reviews.title: BEST I'VE EVER USED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 med. size indoor dogs and they shead, the Metkix lint roller is the BEST I have ever purchased or used, DURABLE, EXCELLENT QUALITY, easy to change refills, definitely will order extra refills and another unit for my daughter, can't say enough good things about this product. THANKS FOR A GREAT PRODUCT...
customer_reviews.author: Mel Morano

customer_reviews.title: The best lint roller ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy, the sticky roll is securely held, an d it stores with the sticky roll coveted so it does not stick on something. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: BE

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best rollers I've purchased. Easy to remove sheets, convenient roller. I haven't had to replace the sheets yet, I hope it is easy to do so.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy peel off sheet.
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my entire sofa of dog hair in about 12 minutes. I’d have to vacuum forever and still never got all the hair off! This was super easy to peel off sheets and got every last piece of hair. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Haleman

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great lint roller, works well. Sticky sheets are super easy to remove, and the cover is super handy. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Chunsajee21

customer_reviews.title: Very good at picking up...everything on my stairs.
customer_reviews.text: Very sticky. Sturdy construction unlike a reusable / washable one i tried that broke in a few minutes. I use on carpeted stairs instead of hauling a vacuum on the steps.
customer_reviews.author: Unique1

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet fur
customer_reviews.text: Use on couch for cat fur. Works great, I go through many sheets. So get more. The handle makes it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a massive couch and a cat leading to me lint rolling my couch every 3-4 days. This is the most efficient and practical tool. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need for dog hair
customer_reviews.text: Very glad to have found this HUGE, and VERY STICKY lint roller to collect hair from my two dogs. Works great on clothing as well as blankets, without damaging either.
customer_reviews.author: f_7677

customer_reviews.title: Solid Roller
customer_reviews.text: I think this would work really well for short hair dogs, but I had to use 5 adhesive pieces to do my couch for my longer haired animals.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Hess

customer_reviews.title: Good for fabric convertible tops!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to remove lint from my convertible top. Works quite well!
customer_reviews.author: MaCKinJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a home with pets!
customer_reviews.text: It's excellent!! I have have 2 huge furry dogs who shed year round and an infant who likes to be on the floor to play. This keeps her area clean, is super easy to use, and grabs everything in its path.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Thread don’t belong in the vacuum. Roll em up
customer_reviews.text: My grand son loves to roll up all the threads in my carpet from my sewing room. Best this way then vacuum. Removing the sheets seamed to get easier by the third one.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for removing fur
customer_reviews.text: This changes the game when it comes to lint rollers. It has a cover so the adhesive surface isnt always exposed. The roll doesnt come off and its so much easier to use. I have a corgi and this easily removes all of his fur from the couch and clothes. I am so happy I bought this! Trust me from one pet owner to another, this is the lint roller for you!<3
customer_reviews.author: John Sgambettera

customer_reviews.title: Nice large roller, easy to peel sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Great roller. Love the size. Sheets are easy to peel when you need a new sticky surface. Perfect for getting pet hair off the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 refill
customer_reviews.text: The ad is misleading. It seems like you get 1 full roller and 2 refills. But you get 1 roller and 1 refill. The ad does say 120 total sheets which is true but the headline is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S

customer_reviews.title: Just try it if you live with a beautiful cat, or dog who’s fir dominates your life.
customer_reviews.text: What I did not like about the delivery of the lint remover was the enclosed business card told us nothing about who or what sent it to me. I LOVE THIS ROLLER. If you have a dog cat or any problem with fur or fuzz, if you wear black and are obsessed about removing it from your jacket, sweaters and pants, or if your sofa is an embarrassment just try it. It is pricey if used frequently. Lynne
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Bellville

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for removing cat hair!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for daily removal of cat hair from the furniture. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Very large and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to use. And still on first roll and I have cats
customer_reviews.author: J. Bunny

customer_reviews.title: I need refills. I can't locate refills!!
customer_reviews.text: This works extremely well on cat hair. I'm sure I'll be reordering in the future. Good value for the money. Product is well made.
customer_reviews.author: G-Honey

customer_reviews.title: much needed for our couch
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use & works better than the small lint rollers. Highly recommended for furniture or for your vehicle. I like the cover too, so it's not always a sticky surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: So so satisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: This hair/lint roller is advertised as very sticky, it is just OK . The sheets peel off quite easily but I’m not totally satisfied to order again. There is another name brand that picks up better.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We use it on our couches with 4 dogs. Helps keep it clean and picks up a lot of stuff. Grey value and size.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Very mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Very average product. Doesn’t pick up pet hair specially. I was very disappointed. Thought it would have more adhesion
customer_reviews.author: Amy T

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: For someone with a lot of pets, this is a lifesaver for keeping furniture more hair free. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: maloner33

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stairs!
customer_reviews.text: This product not only easily cleans pet hair but is the perfect size for stairs. If you don't feel like using your vacuum - you can do a quick clean using only this product. Immediately bought one for relatives who also love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and easy to remove dirty sheet. Used on my bedspreads and sofa and chairs! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Judy meeks

customer_reviews.title: Great with dog hair
customer_reviews.text: This is used for a quick clean on the furniture or clothing. The adhesive strips are the easiest of any lint roller I've ever used to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Works okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea and works okay once you figure out the angle of tape.
customer_reviews.author: KKM

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to remove dirty sheets.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as described and works very well. The refill also fits another lint roller handle I have that is much like a paint roller.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Benz owner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome roller!
customer_reviews.text: So handy and perfect for hair on furniture and blankets! Easy to use and super wide for coverage!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use it on our bedspread to remove dog hair. Will use on couch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific lint roller
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific lint roller! It makes keeping my dark blue sofa free from cat hair (2 cats!) a breeze! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sam1212

customer_reviews.title: Super sticky!
customer_reviews.text: Love this roller! I have 3 cats and I used this roller to pick up those hair from couch. It worked better than any roller I have years yet!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great lint roller.
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog that sheds who sleeps on my bed. I use a lint roller every morning. The wider roller is quicker and I don’t have to use as many sheets as with a regular roller. I love that I can close the cover and not have to worry about the roller sticking to other things when I’m not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie

customer_reviews.title: Sticky!
customer_reviews.text: This is the stickiest roller I've ever used. Picks up tons of pet hair!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany C

customer_reviews.title: Good for Pet Hair
customer_reviews.text: Good for Pet Hair ! I used this lint roller on my bed and sweatshirts to remove hairs. Gets the job done quickly and much more effectively than the standard format lint rollers. Do Not waste your valuable time finding anything else!! Highly recommended for anyone with hairy pets! LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Selena lena

product_meta.title: Metkix Supersize 6.3 inches Lint Roller Extra Large Extra Refill Pet Hair Remover for Furniture Clothes Total 120 Sheets
feature_bullets: METKIX SUPERSIZE LINT ROLLER FOR PET HAIR IS YOUR HOME ASSISTANT: Our large lint roller will serve as a perfect assistant in your home, car and office. Extra large lint roller consists of 60 sheets with a width of 6.30 inch and EXTRA 60 SHEETS LINT ROLLER REFILL, TOTAL 120 SHEETS. Use it as either dog or cat hair remover, It is extremely easy and effective for all surfaces; clothes, furniture, sofa, carpet, bed sheets, curtains, hardwood floor etc.

PROTECTIVE COVER : You will love this cover because you may hide easily the dirty roller when you don’t use supersize couch lint roller pet hair. And at the same time when you closed covers that extra large lint roller for furniture doesn’t stick to anythink around

EXTRA STRONG SIDE GRIP: Thanks to the improved extra sturdy side parts, you will not have any difficulty in using it. The roll won’t fall off, reinforced handle is almost impossible to break, with greatly improved durability to save you time and energy.

EASY PEEL OFF: Thanks to Metkix Lint Rollers for pet hair extra sticky design and easily removable sheet, you will save time and energy in both cleaning your furniture, couch, clothes and replacing the sheet.

LIFETIME WARRANTY: Even though we strongly believe that our pet hair roller is more durable and improved than other lint rollers for pet hair, customer satisfaction is our priority, thus you will be provided a lifetime warranty in case you are not satisfied with the big lint roller.
